definition: to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

sentences.english: If you give an option of failure deep within yourself, you will fail.
sentences.chinese: 如果你内心深处给了自己失败的选项，你将会失败。

sentences.english: But light struggled with dark in Nixon's soul.
sentences.chinese: 然而，光明与黑暗的对决却蛰伏于他的内心深处。

sentences.english: There's something inside us that loves a good monster.
sentences.chinese: 在我们人类内心深处，喜欢有一个好的妖怪。

sentences.english: In fact, it is one that will shake him-and many others-to the core.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，真相让他和很多人内心深处受到极大震撼。

sentences.english: Cli : (Swam knows deep down that what Grovyle says is true.
sentences.chinese: 内心深处，他知道森林蜥蜴说的是真的。

sentences.english: Even when deep inside we know it can t be.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕在内心深处我们清楚这不可能。

sentences.english: Do not take for granted the thins closest to your heart.
sentences.chinese: 不要对内心深处的东西漠然视之。

sentences.english: Inwardly, I wanted to please him, but I was who I was.
sentences.chinese: 内心深处，我试图取悦他，但我还是那一个我。

sentences.english: But my heart refused to let the optimism that the lilacs had brought to me fade.
sentences.chinese: 但我内心深处不愿意让紫丁香刚刚带给我的期待消失。

sentences.english: From deep inside a bull- headed resolution welled up.
sentences.chinese: 一个固执的决定从内心深处涌现出来。

sentences.english: The most deeply convinced art in people's heart should be such a humane art.
sentences.chinese: 人类内心深处最服膺的，应是这种符合人性的艺术。

sentences.english: In the movie, Confucius talks of changing oneself from within.
sentences.chinese: 影片中，孔子讲求从内心深处来改变一个人。

sentences.english: I swayed to my opponent's views in my deep heart.
sentences.chinese: 在我内心深处，我倒倾向于我对手的观点。

sentences.english: He confided his innermost secrets to her.
sentences.chinese: 他向她倾吐了内心深处的秘密。

sentences.english: Every adult still remains a child somewhere deep in his or her soul.
sentences.chinese: 每个成年人无不在内心深处保有一份童真。

sentences.english: I think there's a deep human reluctance to kill other people.
sentences.chinese: 我认为人类自内心深处就对杀戮有排斥。

definition: in the depth of one's soul
central point/in one's thoughts/in one's heart
beneath the surface/fundamentally/at the deepest level
to touch/to stir up (trouble or emotions)/to move (sb's emotions or worry)
to long for/to crave for/to greatly desire
